notesStmt.note: Censored by Domenico Irosolimitano, Italian (active 1575-1624): inscribed with his name, 1599 (31v); see 61, 62-74. Censored by Giovanni Domenico Carretto, Italian (active 1600-1624): inscribed with his name, 1617 (30v); see 100-101 and appendices 80-84.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of the 14th century. Eliyahu: inscribed with his name, folio .

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 9; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153: inscribed (folio [33v]).
